price: 3. Diggah qaranwaa kee baaxô ginooy, ken nammayih addal ginoonak taniimit yeemenc marah Yallih nabnaa kee dudda tascasse astooti tan.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin lil'mu'minīna
